Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.jface.viewers.IFontProvider

Packages that use IFontProvider
Package
Description
org.eclipse.debug.ui.memory
Provides classes and interfaces to render memory blocks in the memory view.
org.eclipse.jface.viewers
Provides a framework for viewers, which are model-based content adapters for SWT widgets.
org.eclipse.ltk.ui.refactoring.model
Application programming interface to provide model integration for refactoring histories.
org.eclipse.team.ui.mapping
Application programming interfaces for working with resource mappings.
org.eclipse.ui.model
Provides a workbench adapter for displaying workbench elements in the UI without having to know the concrete type of the element, and various label providers for workbench-specific objects like editors, views, and perspectives.
org.eclipse.ui.views.properties
Provides the standard Property Sheet view which displays custom properties of the active workbench part's current selection.

    Methods in org.eclipse.debug.ui.memory that return IFontProvider
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected IFontProvider
    AbstractTableRendering.getFontProviderAdapter()
    Returns the font provider for this rendering's memory block or null if none.

  • Uses of IFontProvider in org.eclipse.jface.viewers

    Classes in org.eclipse.jface.viewers that implement IFontProvider
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ColumnLabelProvider
    The ColumnLabelProvider is the label provider for viewers that have column support such as TreeViewer and TableViewer
    class 
    DecoratingLabelProvider
    A decorating label provider is a label provider which combines a nested label provider and an optional decorator.
    class 
    TableColumnViewerLabelProvider
    TableColumnViewerLabelProvider is the mapping from the table based providers to the ViewerLabelProvider.
    class 
    TreeColumnViewerLabelProvider
    TreeViewerLabelProvider is the ViewerLabelProvider that handles TreePaths.

    SynchronizationLabelProvider
    A label provider wrapper that adds synchronization image and/or text decorations to the image and label obtained from the delegate provider.

  • Uses of IFontProvider in org.eclipse.ui.views.properties

    Classes in org.eclipse.ui.views.properties that implement IFontProvider
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    PropertyColumnLabelProvider
    A column label provider that returns label text and images based on a IPropertySourceProvider, forwarding requests for text and image to the label provider returned from the property descriptor for the given property id.
